Package school.cesar.eta.unit

Interface PersonRepository

  • public interface PersonRepository
    Repository interface for Person entities. Demonstrates repository pattern for testing with mocks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long count()
      Counts total number of persons.
      boolean deleteById​(Long id)
      Deletes a person by ID.
      boolean existsById​(Long id)
      Checks if a person exists by ID.
      List<Person> findAll()
      Finds all persons.
      List<Person> findBirthdayToday()
      Finds persons whose birthday is today.
      Optional<Person> findById​(Long id)
      Finds a person by ID.
      List<Person> findByLastName​(String lastName)
      Finds all persons by last name.
      Person save​(Person person)
      Saves a person to the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        Person save​(Person person)
        Saves a person to the repository.
        Parameters:
        person - the person to save
        Returns:
        the saved person with generated ID
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if person is null

      • findById

        Finds a person by ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the person ID
        Returns:
        Optional containing the person if found

      • findByLastName

        List<Person> findByLastName​(String lastName)
        Finds all persons by last name.
        Parameters:
        lastName - the last name to search
        Returns:
        list of persons with matching last name

        Finds all persons.
        Returns:
        list of all persons

      • deleteById

        boolean deleteById​(Long id)
        Deletes a person by ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the person ID
        Returns:
        true if deleted, false if not found

        Checks if a person exists by ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if exists
